Text: Todos Los Romances:  Released on 11 August 1998 by WEA Latina, the record features the three previously released "Romance"-themed albums in which Miguel covered classic boleros in each of them: "Romance" (1991), "Segundo Romance" (1994), and "Romances" (1997).

3:

Text: Todos Los Romances:  Commercially, "Todos Los Romances" peaked at number four in Spain and was certified double Platinum in the country.
